attributes.action: Ensure that all children under the age of seven are fitted with at least one of those laser eyes before the end of 2007.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that this legislation will ensure that British children become the superior European race due to the powers of the laser eye.
Imagine the possibilities that these new high technology eyes would have in the fields of medicine, cutting through things, and heating soup for a quick lunch, therefore giving adults more time to vote and grab oil.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
